title: Enhancing Organizational Development Practical Skills: Project-Based Learning for Brainstorming Optimization Algorithm Improvement

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners analyze convergence/divergence mechanisms of the BSO algorithm and derive improvement directions.
Learners implement a framework optimizing the exploration-exploitation balance using an Orthogonal Design (OD) engine.
Learners apply an algorithm incorporating an auxiliary transfer vector pool and bias-balancing mechanism to benchmark problems.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
